title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 851.1 - Administrative agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 851.1 - Administrative agreements

State Regulations

To avoid unnecessary duplication and achieve maximum
efficiency, signatory agencies to the Delaware River Basin Compact concerned
with pollution control will be utilized to the maximum practical extent in
enforcing these regulations. To that end, the executive director is authorized
to enter into cooperative administrative agreements with these
agencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
851.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
